products.title: boAt Wave Arcade with 1.81 inch HD Display and Bluetooth Calling Smartwatch  (Mint Green Strap, Free Size)
products.description: The boAt Wave Arcade is here to simplify your life and become your fitness transformation partner This is going to get clear of any obstacles that may get in the way of your goals.The 1.83'' HD display makes everything a vibrant and vivid appeal. Thanks to the Advanced Bluetooth calling feature, you can stay in touch with your loved ones wherever you go. With its boAt Coins you may avail coupons based on fitness activities.Its DIY Watch Face Studio gives you the freedom to customize watch faces as per how you want them. Your heart rate, blood oxygen monitoring, and notifications will all keep you constantly connected to both the inside and outside world.The watch keeps you moving no matter what thanks to its IP67 dust, sweat, and splash resistance and multi-sport modes.
spec: Fitness & Outdoor Battery Runtime: Upto 7 days
